wiki.content:
"The River" became a centerpiece of shows on some Springsteen tours. On the 'Born in the U.S.A.' tour, it was often preceded by a long, intense story from Springsteen about his battles with his father growing up, that would sometimes conclude in a good ending and sometimes not; the silence after the story would then be interrupted by the start of the harmonica part.
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: "The River" became a centerpiece of shows on some Springsteen tours. On the 'Born in the U.S.A.' tour, it was often preceded by a long, intense story from Springsteen about his battles with his father growing up, that would sometimes conclude in a good ending and sometimes not; the silence after the story would then be interrupted by the start of the harmonica part.

track.name: The River
comments: This song makes me so sad..
Ja, BRUUUUUUUUCCCCCCE !!!!:-)
WHAT ELSE CAN I SAY?
BRUUUUUUUUUUUUUCE!!!!!!!!
Incredible.
But what is the "something worse"? Self-delusion?
Is a dream a lie if it don't come true, or is it something worse?  Something worse.
Fue la cancion que me hizo que le preste verdadera atencion a Springsteen.

I remember us riding in my brothers car, her body tan and wet down at the reservoir. At night on them banks I'd lie awake and pull her close just to feel each breath she'd take. Now those memories come back to haunt me, they haunt me like a curse. Is a dream a lie if it don't come true, or is it something worse
his only song i can stand...and i love it
Great
This song tells a story that just strikes one as true - and deep. Real people bouncing around in a real world not really understanding but trying their damnedest. [x2]
There is only one BOSS (:
awesome song
Great song
Awesome song
Beautiful song , lovely story , !!
A song of oil, mud, blood and guts.
This song caused a big almost depression by me (The Fear of the future). Since then everytime I hear it it brings tears to my eyes. Superb song in any way.
This song tells a story that just strikes one as true - and deep. Real people bouncing around in a real world not really understanding but trying their damnedest.
